last_episode_to_air.name: Tintin in America
last_episode_to_air.overview: Tintin is covering a story about the gangster in 1930's Chicago. And what better way to do that then going there ?

name: The Adventures of Tintin
overview: Travel with Tintin, the young and intrepid Belgian reporter, and his faithful dog Snowy as they take you from Tibet to the Moon, or from Egypt to the depths of the sea -- solving mysteries, pursuing truth and justice, and gambling with their lives.

episodes.name: The Crab with the Golden Claws (1)
episodes.overview: Tintin finds himself in the middle of a mystery involving a drowned man, a tin of crab meat, and a piece of paper with a strange name on it. He follows the clues to a ship and finds its crew is using the crab tins to smuggle opiates out of the country.

episodes.name: The Crab with the Golden Claws (2)
episodes.overview: Tintin & Haddock escape from the Karaboudjan and now find themselves in a desert, where they find out their problems with Alan and the ship crew are yet far from an end.

episodes.name: The Secret of the Unicorn (1)
episodes.overview: Tintin finds a ship model in the Old Street Market and buys it for Captain Haddock as a gift. Little he knows that it will turn into a treasure hunt, connecting them to Sir Francis Haddock, Captain's ancestor.

episodes.name: The Secret of the Unicorn (2)
episodes.overview: Tintin and Captain Haddock learn there are violent rivals who are after the treasure of the Unicorn themselves.

episodes.name: Red Rackham's Treasure
episodes.overview: Tintin and the Captain search for the pirate's treasure they learned about with the help of their eccentric, but lovable new friend, Professor Calculus.

episodes.name: Cigars of the Pharaoh (1)
episodes.overview: Tintin finds himself – by chance – entangled in a drug traffickers’ ring, which will take him all the way to India.

episodes.name: Cigars of the Pharaoh (2)
episodes.overview: In India, Tintin meets the Maharaj of Gaipajama and finds out he will need to help him and his family to fight an opium business dangerous gang that works in that region.

episodes.name: The Blue Lotus (1)
episodes.overview: Tintin heads to Sheanghai after receiving part of a message mentioning a mysterious man named Mitsuhirato. There, he finds out he might have to deal with remaining problems with the opium gang he and the Maharaja thought to be over.

episodes.name: The Blue Lotus (2)
episodes.overview: Tintin needs to find a doctor who can save those injected with the madness poison. However, the doctor was kidnapped by the syndicate and is now being held hostage outside the border of Shanghai. Tintin will have to try to escape from Shanghai to put an end to the syndicate once and for all.

episodes.name: The Black Island (1)
episodes.overview: When Tintin is mysteriously shot by the pilot of downed plane, he travels to Britain to uncover a sinister plot.

episodes.name: The Black Island (2)
episodes.overview: Tintin, still wondering Britain, goes to Scotland to investigate a mysterious island that locals affirm to be the home of a terrible beast.

episodes.name: The Calculus Affair (1)
episodes.overview: Strange events at Marlin Spike Hall and the kidnapping of Professor Calculus send Tintin, Snowy and Captain Haddock on a dangerous rescue mission.

episodes.name: The Calculus Affair (2)
episodes.overview: Tintin and Haddock set out to rescue Professor Calculus.

episodes.name: The Shooting Star
episodes.overview: Tintin and a group of scientists sail out to the Arctic Ocean to study a meteorite that has fallen. However, the team will have to deal with another expedition that will compete with them at any cost.

episodes.name: The Broken Ear (1)
episodes.overview: Tintin goes to a jungle in South America to look for an Arumbaya Fetish which has been stolen from a museum, but he will have to face some dangerous people who are also after the Fetish for some mysterious reasons.

episodes.name: The Broken Ear (2)
episodes.overview: Tintin arrives at the village of the Arumbayas and finds the long-lost explorer Ridgewell, who is believed to be dead for many years.

episodes.name: King Ottokar's Sceptre (1)
episodes.overview: A good turn Tintin does for an absent-minded sigillographer gets him involved in dangerous political intrigue in the Balkan nation of Syldavia.

episodes.name: King Ottokar's Sceptre (2)
episodes.overview: Tintin and Snowy must recover the lost scepter of King Ottokar before the rightful King is forced to abdicate by greedy forces.

episodes.name: Tintin in Tibet (1)
episodes.overview: After learning that his friend, Chang, was in a plane crash in the Himalayas, Tintin goes on the dangerous and somewhat impossible journey to find him.

episodes.name: Tintin in Tibet (2)
episodes.overview: The sherpas escorting Tintin's party abandons them out of fear for the Abominable Snowman, all except Tharkey. He will help Tintin, Snowy and Haddock to face the deadly Himalaya mountains and the Yeti in hope of finding Tintin's friend, Chang.

episodes.name: Tintin and the Picaros (1)
episodes.overview: Tintin walks into a dangerous trap after three of his friends are falsely arrested in South America.

episodes.name: Tintin and the Picaros (2)
episodes.overview: Tintin gets caught up in South America trying to rescue his friends.

episodes.name: Land of Black Gold (1)
episodes.overview: Tintin goes undercover to the Middle East to solve a mysterious oil crisis.

episodes.name: Land of Black Gold (2)
episodes.overview: While trying to solve a mysterious oil crisis, Tintin uncovers a diabolical plot to start a world war.

episodes.name: Flight 714 (1)
episodes.overview: Tintin becomes caught up in the kidnapping of a millionaire.

episodes.name: Flight 714 (2)
episodes.overview: While trying to rescue a kidnapped millionaire, Tintin receives help from an unlikely source.

episodes.name: The Red Sea Sharks (1)
episodes.overview: Tintin and Captain Haddock travel to Khemed to rescue the Emir from the danger of arms smugglers who have overthrown his government.

episodes.name: The Red Sea Sharks (2)
episodes.overview: Tintin and Captain Haddock try to stop a terrible refugee smuggling ring and end up trapped with the other prisoners out at sea.

episodes.name: The Seven Crystal Balls (1)
episodes.overview: Tintin investigates the mysterious illness that coincidentally falls upon all seven members of a South American expedition.

episodes.name: The Seven Crystal Balls (2)
episodes.overview: Tintin and captain Haddock discover that Professor Calculus has been kidnapped.

episodes.name: Prisoners of the Sun (1)
episodes.overview: Tintin and the Captain travel to Peru in search of Professor Calculus.

episodes.name: Prisoners of the Sun (2)
episodes.overview: In search for the prisoners and Professor Calculus, Tintin and Captain Haddock head for the "Temple of the Sun".

episodes.name: The Castafiore Emerald (1)
episodes.overview: When Captain Haddock injures himself, he receives a surprise visit from Bianca Castafiore, who is preoccupied about her prized jewels.

episodes.name: The Castafiore Emerald (2)
episodes.overview: When Bianca Castafiore's prized jewel disappears, Tintin secretly investigates the situation.

episodes.name: Destination Moon (1)
episodes.overview: After receiving a telegram from Professor Calculus, Tintin and Captain Haddock travel to meet him at the atomic centre in Syldavia. They soon discover that the secret rocket ship documents have been stolen.

episodes.name: Destination Moon (2)
episodes.overview: Tintin and Captain Haddock have been asked to be part of the expedition to the moon. As they help Professor Calculus prepare for the launch, Tintin persists in finding the internal spy.

episodes.name: Explorers on the Moon (1)
episodes.overview: Tintin, Captain Haddock, Professor Calculus and Wolff blast off to the moon. They soon discover that the Thompsons' have somehow slipped on board.

episodes.name: Explorers on the Moon (2)
episodes.overview: Tintin, Captain Haddock, Calculus, the Thompsons and Wolff uncover the wonders of the moon. They also discover another person aboard the rocket ship who threatens to leave them all stranded on the moon.

episodes.name: Tintin in America
episodes.overview: Tintin is covering a story about the gangster in 1930's Chicago. And what better way to do that then going there ?
